abilities.name: ***Rapid Attack.***
abilities.ability: Taking a -2 penalty to AC until the beginning of its next turn, the soldier can make two attacks with a weapon this round.

actions.name: ***Vibrosword.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, one target. *Hit* 8 (1d10 + 2)

actions.name: ***Dual Vibroblades.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, one target. *Hit* 6 (1d6 + 2)

actions.name: ***Blaster Rifle.***
actions.action: *Ranged Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, one target. *Hit* 7 (1d8 + 2)
